channel.title: 法新社
channel.description: 这是一个追踪法新社news的种子

item.title: 视频：四届俄罗斯举重冠军奥列格-穆索克拉诺夫（Oleg Musokhranov）将缺席今年夏天的巴黎奥运会，因为他坚持只参加俄罗斯国旗下的比赛。
item.description: VIDEO: Four-time Russian weightlifting champion Oleg Musokhranov will sit out the Paris Olympics this summer after insisting he would only take part under the Russian flag.

item.title: 今年巴黎奥运会和残奥会的奖牌中央将有一块取自原埃菲尔铁塔的六角形铁片，组织者在周四公布奖牌设计时说。 #AFPSports
item.description:
The medals awarded at this year's Paris Olympics and Paralympics will feature a hexagon-shaped piece of iron taken from the original Eiffel Tower in their centre, organisers said as they unveiled their design on Thursday.
#AFPSports
tinyurl.com/cvpryy3v

item.title: 火花、火箭和带易燃花瓣的旋转向日葵--中国杭州的烟花店里摆满了烟火爱好者的美食，他们为自己能生活在允许燃放烟花爆竹的地方而感到幸运。
item.description:
Sparklers, rockets and spinning sunflowers with flammable petals -- the fireworks stores in China's Hangzhou are stuffed with treats for pyrotechnic-loving customers, who count themselves lucky to live somewhere they are allowed to set them off.
tinyurl.com/mrjvku8s

item.title: 视频：乌克兰自俄罗斯入侵乌克兰以来，整个顿巴斯地区唯一一家设有新生儿科和早产儿保温箱的妇产医院一直在不停地运转。该医院的早产儿分娩比例比战前翻了一番。
item.description: VIDEO: The only maternity hospital in the entire Donbas region with a neonatal unit and incubators for premature babies has functioned non-stop since Russia invaded Ukraine. The proportion of premature baby deliveries at the hospital has double since before the war.

item.title: #习近平称中俄应反对外部势力干涉：国家媒体
item.description: #BREAKING Xi says China, Russia should oppose interference by external forces: state media

item.title: 冰岛西南部的雷克雅未克半岛周四开始火山爆发，这是 12 月以来该地区发生的第三次火山爆发。
item.description:
A volcanic eruption started on the Reykjanes peninsula in southwestern Iceland on Thursday, the third to hit the area since December, authorities said.
tinyurl.com/4mpa4mxv

item.title: R to @AFP：#最新消息：乌克兰市长周四表示，大批俄罗斯军队正在猛攻乌克兰前线城镇阿夫迪夫卡，从而使长达数月之久的夺取这一工业中心的努力升级。
item.description:
#UPDATE Large numbers of Russian forces are storming the frontline Ukrainian town of Avdiivka, its Ukrainian mayor said Thursday, escalating a months-long effort to capture the industrial hub.
tinyurl.com/mttxkj85

item.title: 视频：小时候，罗利-马马尼（Roly Mamani）在玻利维亚农村的贫困环境中长大，他自己动手制作玩具。现在，他是一名 34 岁的工程师，他用 3D 打印技术为因意外事故而伤痕累累的土著同胞制作义肢。
item.description: VIDEO: As a kid growing up in poverty in rural Bolivia, Roly Mamani built his own toys. Now a 34-year-old engineer, he 3D prints limbs for Indigenous compatriots scarred by life-changing accidents.

item.title: R to @AFP：#俄罗斯选举委员会已阻止支持和平的政治家鲍里斯-纳杰日丁（Boris Nadezhdin）参加下个月的总统选举。
item.description:
#UPDATE Russia's election commission has blocked pro-peace politician Boris Nadezhdin from running in next month's presidential election, the candidate said in a post on social media.
tinyurl.com/2uj2u3rr

item.title: 视频：在墨西哥西部的一个土著社区里，空气中弥漫着香味，燃烧的木棒照亮了夜晚。每年，普雷佩查人都会带着珍贵的火种从一个村庄到另一个村庄庆祝新年。
item.description: VIDEO: Incense fills the air and burning sticks light up the night in an Indigenous community in western Mexico where an ancient ritual has been brought back to life. Every year, the Purepecha people celebrate their New Year by taking a precious fire from village to village.

item.title: 视频：本周，数以百万计的城市居民挤在火车车厢里，离开中国各大城市返回家乡，共享美食、向长辈拜年，并为即将到来的龙年送上祝福。
item.description: VIDEO: Packed into train carriages, millions of urbanites this week leave China's major cities for their hometowns to share meals, pay respects to their elders and deliver blessings for the upcoming Year of the Dragon.

item.title: R to @AFP：#俄罗斯选举委员会周四禁止支持和平的政治家鲍里斯-纳杰日丁（Boris Nadezhdin）参加下个月的总统选举，该候选人在社交媒体上发帖称。
item.description: #UPDATE Russia's election commission on Thursday blocked pro-peace politician Boris Nadezhdin from running in next month's presidential election, the candidate said in a post on social media.

item.title: 视频一年前，阿芙拉-萨瓦迪（Afraa al-Sawadi）从家中的废墟中被拉了出来，她的脐带还连着她死去的母亲，那场毁灭性的地震肆虐了土耳其和叙利亚，造成近 6 万人死亡。
item.description: VIDEO: A year ago, Afraa al-Sawadi was pulled from the rubble of her home still attached to her dead mother by the umbilical cord, after a devastating earthquake ravaged Turkey and Syria and killed nearly 60,000 people.

item.title: #俄罗斯阻止反普京竞选者纳杰日丁参加选举：候选人
item.description: #BREAKING Russia blocks anti-Putin campaigner Nadezhdin from election: candidate

item.title:
德国图书馆加强防御，抵御极右翼攻击。
污损和破坏、撕毁书籍、在书页上涂写政治信息：据称极右翼分子在柏林一家市图书馆大肆破坏的证据摆满了整张桌子
item.description:
German libraries up defences against far-right attack.

Defaced and destroyed, books torn up and political messages scrawled across their pages: the evidence of an alleged far-right vandalism spree at a city library in Berlin covers an entire table

u.afp.com/5Gcv

item.title:
"我是去送死的"
尼泊尔雇佣兵在乌克兰为俄罗斯而战 他们在远离喜马拉雅故乡的地方杀戮 是被护照和现金的承诺所诱惑 但受伤的回返者警告任何想参战的人"不要来"
item.description:
"I was there to die."

Nepali mercenaries are fighting for Russia in Ukraine, lured to kill far from their Himalayan homeland by promises of a passport and cash, but wounded returnees warn anyone tempted to join the war: "Do not come"

u.afp.com/5GcD

item.title: #市长说，俄罗斯军队正以 "非常大的 "人数攻打乌克兰东部的阿夫杰夫卡
item.description: #BREAKING Russian forces storming Avdiivka in east Ukraine with 'very large' numbers, says mayor

item.title:
Project Veritas 承认散布美国大选虚假信息。
该右翼组织放弃了关于一名邮政局长在 2020 年大选期间非法倒签邮寄选票的虚假说法，凸显了诉讼在打击虚假信息方面的力量
item.description:
Project Veritas admits spreading US election disinformation.

The right-wing group has renounced bogus claims that a postmaster illegally backdated mail-in ballots during the 2020 election, highlighting the power of litigation in combatting disinformation
u.afp.com/5Gcx

item.title:
每日面包
#阿富汗通讯社的奥马尔-阿布拉尔（Omer Abrar）拍摄了阿富汗儿童在巴达赫尚省法扎巴德（Fayzabad）的一家街头面包店购买面包的照片。
item.description:
Daily bread.

#AFP's Omer Abrar photographs Afghan children buying bread from a street bakery in Fayzabad, Badakhshan province

item.title:
R to @AFP：#最新消息：当局称，冰岛雷克雅未克半岛周四发生火山爆发，这是自 12 月以来该地区发生的第三次火山爆发。
现场视频图像显示，炽热的熔岩从裂缝中渗出，照亮了夜空中升起的一缕缕浓烟。
"今晨5:30，西林加菲尔东北部开始发生强烈的小地震活动。大约 30 分钟后，同一地区开始喷发。
item.description:
#UPDATE A volcano erupted on Iceland's Reykjanes peninsula on Thursday, the third to hit the area since December, authorities say.

Live video images show glowing lava oozing out of a fissure illuminating a plume of smoke rising up under the night sky.

"At 5:30 this morning intense small earthquake activity began northeast of Sylingarfell. About 30 minutes later, an eruption began in the same area," an Icelandic Meteorological Office (IMO) statement says

item.title:
死星 "上的生命？
土星卫星米马斯的冰壳下面隐藏着一个巨大的海洋，其中有许多孕育原始外星生命的必要成分
item.description:
Life on 'Death Star'?

Underneath the icy shell of Saturn's moon Mimas is a vast hidden ocean that has many of the ingredients necessary to host primitive alien life

u.afp.com/5Gqx

item.title: #媒体报道称，冰岛西南部雷克雅未克半岛周四开始火山爆发，这是自 12 月以来该地区第三次火山爆发
item.description: #BREAKING A volcanic eruption started on the Reykjanes peninsula in southwestern Iceland on Thursday, the third to hit the area since December, media reports say

item.title:
以色列内塔尼亚胡命令部队准备进入人满为患的加沙城拉法。
尽管旨在确保与哈马斯休战的新一轮会谈将于周四在开罗举行，但以色列还是下达了这一命令。
item.description:
Israel's Netanyahu orders troops to prepare to enter the overcrowded Gazan city of Rafah.

The order comes even as a new round of talks aimed at securing a truce with Hamas are set to open Thursday in Cairo

u.afp.com/5GcG

item.title: R to @AFP：视频：巴基斯坦全国和省级选举期间，安全人员在奎达的一个投票站进行检查
item.description: VIDEO: Security officers conduct checks at a polling station in Quetta during Pakistan's national and provincial elections

item.title:
视频： 北京火车站人潮涌动，迎接春节高峰。
本周，数亿人从中国各大城市涌出，参加世界上最大规模的年度迁徙，回家分享美食、给长辈拜年，并为即将到来的龙年送上祝福。
item.description:
VIDEO: Crowds throng Beijing railway station for Lunar New Year rush.

Hundreds of millions of people are streaming out of China's major cities this week in the world's largest annual migration, heading home to share meals, pay respects to their elders and deliver blessings for the upcoming Year of the Dragon

item.title: 美国最高法院周四决定是否禁止唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）再次竞选总统，勉强成为 2024 年白宫竞选的中心舞台
item.description:
US Supreme Court reluctantly takes center stage in the 2024 White House race on Thursday as it decides whether Donald Trump should be barred from running again for president

u.afp.com/5Gq2

item.title: 巴布亚新几内亚总理周四成为有史以来首位在澳大利亚议会发表讲话的太平洋岛国领导人，尽管中国的姿态日益高涨，但巴布亚新几内亚总理仍誓言要与中国保持密切关系。
item.description:
Papua New Guinea's prime minister on Thursday became the first Pacific Island leader ever to address Australia's parliament, vowing close ties despite ever-louder overtures from China

u.afp.com/5Gqd

item.title: 土星的小卫星米马斯似乎不太可能是寻找生命的嫌疑人。但科学家们说，在这颗不起眼的卫星的冰壳下面，隐藏着一个巨大的海洋，其中有许多孕育原始外星生命的必要成分 ⬇️
item.description:
Saturn's small moon Mimas seems an unlikely suspect in the hunt for life. But scientists say that underneath the unassuming moon's icy shell is a vast hidden ocean that has many of the ingredients necessary to host primitive alien life ⬇️
u.afp.com/5GSm

item.title: 专家们周三表示，濒临灭绝的帝王斑蝶在墨西哥越冬地的种群数量急剧下降，并将这一 "令人警醒 "的下降主要归咎于气候变化和杀虫剂的使用 ⬇️。
item.description:
Population numbers of endangered monarch butterflies have fallen sharply at their wintering sites in Mexico, experts said Wednesday, blaming the "sobering" drop primarily on climate change and the use of pesticides ⬇️
u.afp.com/5GqT

item.title: 当局称，一名破产的纽约房地产开发商于周三被起诉，罪名是自 2015 年以来通过一系列精心策划的阴谋从投资者手中窃取了超过 8600 万美元的资金
item.description:
A bankrupt New York property developer was indicted on Wednesday for stealing more than $86 million from investors through an elaborate series of schemes dating back to 2015, authorities said
u.afp.com/5Gq3
